body: Hi all ,  I have  this issue , I plugged different weather files  with a very simple model but the same issue . plz tell me what I'm missing here ?  Thank you Mona   [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/hAXKVxAmtpL-pMW35Gdx-FE0M3r*eM1uSHHSOFslh4TVxXqEF9pEDTJBsBCjbdrCzRBZv-ZUSOGU826ql*vGWiV-hTTzpKlL/error.jpg)

replies.body:
Hi mona,

This error related to epw file path.

See this:

[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/weather-sim...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/weather-simulation-requested-but-no-file-attached)

-Omid

Hi Omid , 

Thank you for your reply, I tried to use the weather file path on my pc but nothing is happened , I put it on C and I made sure that the name with no spaces. 

Mona

mona,

Probably, the problem is the file name or file destination Path on your pc.

Can you send your selected file path here?

like this :

C:\Users\Omid\Document\epwfiles\PHL_Manila.984290_IWEC.epw



-Omid

Hi Omid , 

sorry for late reply , here's my file path : 

C:\ladybug\wf\EGY_Helwan.623780_ETMY.epw

thank you , 

Mona

Hi mona, It works for me. But you can use another way to download weather files. Use "Ladybug Open EPW And STAT Weather Files" component and set weather files url to download that. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5BmPB0O-KpSDVUKYdKztUip9FfR2HmaUzTcyOVk4OS7vhKIzhZ*mJ056SdxRcTiDsSgDytzR0i0giY2LUvXLsu79rjJCWYvy/455.PNG)  Like this weather url: [https://energyplus.net/weather-download/africa_wmo_region_1/EGY//EG...](https://energyplus.net/weather-download/africa_wmo_region_1/EGY//EGY_Helwan.623780_ETMY/all) ... [https://energyplus.net/weather](https://energyplus.net/weather) -Omid

Hi Omid , 

I tried everything but nothing happened , so I removed LB& HB and installed it again ,so the problem is finally solved .

Thank you for your efforts trying to help me , wish you all the best  :) 

Mona
